properties.name: Langbruch
properties.label: green
properties.comments: Harnessed vehicles on Unpaved agricultural and forestry roads forbidden. Motor vehicle on Unpaved agricultural and forestry roads forbidden. Cycling on Unpaved agricultural and forestry roads forbidden. Horse riding on Unpaved agricultural and forestry roads forbidden. Fire on Total area of the territory forbidden. Camping on Total area of the territory forbidden. Camping/Bivouac on Total area of the territory forbidden. Dogs without leash on Total area of the territory forbidden. Collecting plants on Total area of the territory forbidden. Collecting minerals/fossils on Total area of the territory forbidden. Mushroom collecting on Total area of the territory forbidden. Drones/model planes on Total area of the territory forbidden. Disposing of waste on Total area of the territory forbidden. Air sport (staring and landing) on Total area of the territory forbidden. Entering the area on Designated paths/places allowed. Entering off the beaten path on Total area of the territory forbidden. Feeding animals on Total area of the territory forbidden. Noise (tape recorders, players)   on Total area of the territory forbidden. Smoking on Total area of the territory forbidden. Cutting or injuring trees on Total area of the territory forbidden. Camping (vehicle/trailer) on Total area of the territory forbidden.
